alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Dillon; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bladen, Robeson, west central Brunswick, Columbus, southeastern Florence, Georgetown, eastern Dillon, Horry, Marion and eastern Williamsburg Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms generally along a line extending from near Jerome to Graves. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Lumberton, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Georgetown, Marion, Dillon, Whiteville, DeBordieu Colony, Mullins, Surfside Beach, Elizabethtown, Red Springs, Pawleys Island, Murrells Inlet, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Myrtle Beach Airport, Yawkey South Island and Winyah Bay Entrance. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 193 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 38. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Dillon; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
